name: Flying Tom-Cat - Cool Virtual Jump And Run Adventure For Boys And Girls FREE
name_original: Flying Tom-Cat - Cool Virtual Jump And Run Adventure For Boys And Girls FREE
description:
******* Free Cat Swinging Game! *******

***** Hours of furniture jumping fun *****

When the master is away, the cat will play!

Catapult our wonderful feline friend deep into the heart of his human’s wonderful abode as he weaves past furniture and appliances in the wackiest game ever. Help him swing his way through various challenging levels while collecting crazy bonuses in this wonderful cat-swinging adventure.

This is an extremely addictive, fast-paced, pick-up and play game. With exceptionally clever level design, gorgeous graphics and solid physics dynamics you'll want to keep playing and playing. It’s guaranteed hard to put down.

Definitely purr-fect!

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Exciting music tracks

Sharpen your claws and get into the action!

Download FREE Today!
